title: Used Coolant Water from Power Plants

content.prompt: When water used to cool power plants during normal plant operations is released into adjacent waterways, which of the following is most likely to occur as a result?

choices.label: Biodiversity of aquatic life in the adjacent waterways would decrease because the used coolant water is radioactive.
The dissolved oxygen in the adjacent waterways would decrease because used coolant water is warm and leads to thermal pollution.
Salinity in the adjacent waterways would increase because of dissolved solids in the used coolant water.
Nutrient levels in the adjacent waterways would increase because of phosphorous in the used coolant water.

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain environmental concepts, processes, or models in applied contexts.
